about_the_game:
Do you want to create your dream Bathroom? With the Bathroom DLC it's now possible. You can create any bathroom you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, shared or separate - it's all up to you.

Try all 78 new items and create your dream Bathroom. Why not make a bathroom gaming setup? Combine DLC furniture with default one to achive best looking room and let your imagination run wild.


Give your room a special touch with new items and turn it into a dream environment.

The Bathroom DLC contains:

  • 78 new items.
  • Animated showers and bathtubs.
  • Bathtubs, showers, washing machines, towels, shampoos and more.
